item.title: ReCapture: Generative Video Camera Controls for User-Provided Videos using Masked Video Fine-Tuning
item.description: ReCapture generates videos with novel camera angles from user videos using masked video fine-tuning, preserving scene motion and plausibly hallucinating unseen parts.
